mapper.update: create table anyquant.quotaData_${value} ( id int(11) not null primary key, date date not null, m5 double default 0, m10 double default 0, m20 double default 0, m30 double default 0, bias5 double default 0, bias10 double default 0, bias20 double default 0, boll1 double default 0, boll2 double default 0, boll3 double default 0, rsi double default 0, rsi5 double default 0, rsi10 double default 0, rsi20 double default 0, vr double default 0, rsv double default 0, k double default 50, d double default 50, j double default 0, ema12 double default 0, ema26 double default 0, ema50 double default 0, ema5 double default 0, ema35 double default 0, ema10 double default 0, ema60 double default 0, diff double default 0, dea double default 0, macd double default 0, dmh double default 0, dml double default 0, tr double default 0, dmh12 double default 0, dml12 double default 0, tr12 double default 0, dih double default 0, dil double default 0, dih12 double default 0, dil12 double default 0, dx double default 0, adx double default 0, adxr double default 0, obv double default 0, roc12 double default 0, roc25 double default 0 )
mapper.insert: insert into anyquant.quotadata_${siid} (id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25) values(#{quotaData1.id},#{quotaData1.date},#{quotaData1.m5},#{quotaData1.m10},#{quotaData1.m20},#{quotaData1.m30}, #{quotaData1.bias5},#{quotaData1.bias10},#{quotaData1.bias20},#{quotaData1.boll1},#{quotaData1.boll2},#{quotaData1.boll3}, #{quotaData1.rsi},#{quotaData1.rsi5},#{quotaData1.rsi10},#{quotaData1.rsi20},#{quotaData1.vr},#{quotaData1.rsv},#{quotaData1.k},#{quotaData1.d},#{quotaData1.j}, #{quotaData1.ema12},#{quotaData1.ema26},#{quotaData1.ema50},#{quotaData1.ema5},#{quotaData1.ema35},#{quotaData1.ema10},#{quotaData1.ema60}, #{quotaData1.diff},#{quotaData1.dea},#{quotaData1.macd}, #{quotaData1.dmh},#{quotaData1.dml},#{quotaData1.tr},#{quotaData1.dmh12},#{quotaData1.dml12},#{quotaData1.tr12},#{quotaData1.dih},#{quotaData1.dil},#{quotaData1.dih12},#{quotaData1.dil12},#{quotaData1.dx},#{quotaData1.adx},#{quotaData1.adxr}, #{quotaData1.obv},#{quotaData1.roc12},#{quotaData1.roc25})

insert into anyquant.quotadata_${siid} (id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25) values
(#{quotaData.id},#{quotaData.date},#{quotaData.m5},#{quotaData.m10},#{quotaData.m20},#{quotaData.m30}, #{quotaData.bias5},#{quotaData.bias10},#{quotaData.bias20},#{quotaData.boll1},#{quotaData.boll2},#{quotaData.boll3}, #{quotaData.rsi},#{quotaData.rsi5},#{quotaData.rsi10},#{quotaData.rsi20},#{quotaData.vr},#{quotaData.rsv},#{quotaData.k},#{quotaData.d},#{quotaData.j}, #{quotaData.ema12},#{quotaData.ema26},#{quotaData.ema50},#{quotaData.ema5},#{quotaData.ema35},#{quotaData.ema10},#{quotaData.ema60}, #{quotaData.diff},#{quotaData.dea},#{quotaData.macd}, #{quotaData.dmh},#{quotaData.dml},#{quotaData.tr},#{quotaData.dmh12},#{quotaData.dml12},#{quotaData.tr12},#{quotaData.dih},#{quotaData.dil},#{quotaData.dih12},#{quotaData.dil12},#{quotaData.dx},#{quotaData.adx},#{quotaData.adxr}, #{quotaData.obv},#{quotaData.roc12},#{quotaData.roc25})
mapper.select: select count(*) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select * from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date=#{date1}
select * from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id = #{id1}
select max(bias5) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select min(bias5) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select max(bias10) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select min(bias10) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select max(bias20) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select min(bias20) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
select obv from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select boll1 from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select boll2 from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select boll3 from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select roc12 from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select Roc25 from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select dmh from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select dmi from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select dih from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select dil from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select dx from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select adx from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select adxr from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select diff from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select dea from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
select macd from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1}
